titles.title: Protecting Foods and Beverages from Government Attack Act of 2017
Protecting Foods and Beverages from Government Attack Act of 2017

To prohibit the use of Federal money for print, radio, television or any other media advertisement, campaign, or form of publicity against the use of a food or beverage that is lawfully marketed under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
Protecting Foods and Beverages from Government Attack Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Protecting Foods and Beverages from Government Attack Act of 2017
This bill prohibits federal funding of print, radio, television or any other media advertisement, campaign, or form of publicity against the use of a food or beverage that is lawfully marketed under the Federal Food, Drug, and Cosmetic Act.
